com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.service

Interface WorkflowService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorkflowServiceImpl

    public interface WorkflowService
    This interface represents the service for workflow execution.
    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate: 2015-04-14 12:42:19 +0530 (Tue, 14 Apr 2015) $
    $LastChangedRevision: 21594 $
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 29-Oct-2014
